title: Provider duty: establish and document post-market monitoring system for high-risk AI systems

legal_consequence.verbatim: Providers shall establish and document a post-market monitoring system in a manner that is proportionate to the nature of the AI technologies and the risks of the high-risk AI system.

items.label: Active and systematic collection and analysis
items.text: The system shall actively and systematically collect, document and analyse relevant data on performance throughout lifetime to evaluate continuous compliance.

items.label: Plan and template
items.text: The post-market monitoring plan is part of technical documentation; the Commission will adopt a template by 2026‑02‑02.

items.label: Integration under Annex I(A) and finance
items.text: Integration with sectoral post-market systems is allowed to avoid duplication if equivalent protection is achieved.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
